metadata.title: CVE-2017-14410 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer over-read was discovered in III_i_stereo in layer3.c in mpglibDBL,as used in MP3Gain version 1.5.2. The vulnerability causes an applicationcrash, which leads to remote denial of service.

criterions.comment: mp3gain: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
